text: The COVID-19 pandemic in Hong Kong is part of the worldwide pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 () caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (). The virus was first confirmed to have spread to : Hong Kong on 23 January 2020. Hong Kong was not affected badly during the first wave of the pandemic. Many people believe it is because people normally wear face masks in Hong Kong. The government also limited travel and used quarantine hotels. ==References== Hong Kong Category:21st century in Hong Kong
title: COVID-19 pandemic in Hong Kong
